content:
From: Steve W <s.wong.731@gmail.com>
Hello

Just for experimental reasons, I've made some changes to the source of
Isabelle. How do I recompile Isabelle from source? Is rebuilding the logics
sufficient? The changes I've made is to some files in Provers/. Thanks for
the help.

Steve

From: Jasmin Blanchette <jasmin.blanchette@gmail.com>
Yes, rebuilding the logics is sufficient.

Jasmin

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Just use the Isabelle2009-2/build executable -- there are also some
options, pass -? for help.

Makarius
